x = 111000110   y = 101101111
	x + y = 1100110101
	x - y = 1010111
	x * y = 101000101011011010
x = 11100011001   y = 10110
	x + y = 11100101111
	x - y = 11100000011
	x * y = 1001110000100110
x = 111000111000111000111   y = 101010101010101
	x + y = 111001100011100011100
	x - y = 111000001110001110010
	x * y = 100101111011001110001101101000010011
x = 1110   y = 101
	x + y = 10011
	x - y = 1001
	x * y = 1000110
x = 1   y = 0
	x + y = 1
	x - y = 1
	x * y = 0
x = 1   y = 1
	x + y = 10
	x - y = 0
	x * y = 1
x = 0   y = 0
	x + y = 0
	x - y = 0
	x * y = 0
x = 10010   y = 101
	x + y = 10111
	x - y = 1101
	x * y = 1011010
